The Guardian | LONDON | ONSITE

Looking for fullstack or server-side devs interested in working on APIs and related tools using JVM languages (Scala at present) on AWS. The work is really interesting and the Guardian is a great company - both from a tech perspective because of our scale, and because of the journalism we do. I head this team from a tech side so any questions get in touch! (nicolas.long@theguardian.com).

More details here (ignore the technology list - more important is good ideas and a willingness to learn):

http://underscore.io/jobs/2015-05-20-guardian-discussion/
